name: Onion Soup
description:
It's short game with sandbox elements. Show your ability in soup cooking !

Control

Move - WASD and space. Use E and mouse to interact. Read below to learn more.

Craft system!

You can pick up trash and make things out of it. 

Build system!

You can install different objects, including parts of the house. Left mouse button setting, right - rotating object.

Grow plants and harvest crops!

Seeds, pot (soil), water - that’s what you need to grow plants. (Just click on the fruit to get it)

Sell and Buy

You can put things in the trash can for money and spend  arnings in the "phone-store".

Cook and taste!

Use the collected ingredients to cook the soup. You can boil, fry and mash!
